nodes.text: Requiem for a Rogue, Part 1 was the seventeenth issue in the Star Wars: X-Wing Rogue Squadron series of comics. It was released on March 1, 1997 by Dark Horse Comics.

Malrev IV is an uncivilized planet in a pretty, but otherwise useless, corner of the galaxy. Inhabited by vicious, unthinking brutes, it's like a living museum of pre-evolution. You wouldn't bother going there unless you had a death wish... or you were a member of Rogue Squadron and you were trying to rescue a downed cruise liner.
